main event: On June 20, 1952, two unidentified flying objects were observed in Shamokin, Pennsylvania, exhibiting erratic maneuvers and an orangey color.
interesting points: The objects were described as cigar-shaped., The witnesses included Mrs. and several boys., The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes., The weather was clear during the observation., Similar sightings were reported on two different nights.
witness description: Mrs. Kathleen May and six boys
